title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Learning-Centered Leadership and Teacher Learning in Urban and Rural Elementary Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: One can distinguish and explain core elements of learner-centered leadership based on urban/rural educational environments.
One can analyze the mediating effects of teacher trust and agency on teacher learning by connecting empirical research data.
In blended learning environments, one can visualize regional leadership differences using comparative analysis tools or digital resources.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
